name: Total Number of Laboratory Tests
query:
SELECT 
    si.name,
    si.patient,
    si.posting_date,
    si.source_order,
    sii.item_name
FROM `tabSales Invoice` AS si
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` AS sii ON si.name = sii.parent
WHERE 
    si.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    OR (
        si.source_order = %(source_order)s 
        OR sii.test_name = %(test_name)s
    )
